actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the use of funds for the Peace Corps to be used for travel expenses of individuals in order for abortions to be performed on those individuals.
subjects: Abortion, Birth Control, and Family Planning

summary.text: Amends the Peace Corps Act to prohibit using Peace Corps funds for travel expenses of an individual if the purpose of the travel is to have an abortion performed on the individual, except where the life of the mother would be endangered if the fetus were carried to term.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the use of funds for the Peace Corps to be used for travel expenses of individuals in order for abortions to be performed on those individuals.
